00052 void EnterIMPPortraits( void )
00053 {
00054   
00055             // create buttons
00056       CreateIMPPortraitButtons( );
00057       
00058       // render background
00059       RenderIMPPortraits( );

00061

00066 void RenderIMPPortraits( void )
00067 {
00068   
00069 
00070   // render background
00071       RenderProfileBackGround( );
00072 
00073             // the Voices frame
00074       RenderPortraitFrame( 191, 167 );
00075 
00076       // render the current portrait
00077       RenderPortrait( 200, 176 );
00078 
00079       // indent for the text
00080       RenderAttrib1IndentFrame( 128, 65); 
00081       
00082       // text
00083       PrintImpText( );
00084 
00085       return;
00086 }

00097 void HandleIMPPortraits( void )
00098 {
00099 
00100       // do we need to re write screen
00101       if ( fReDrawPortraitScreenFlag == TRUE ) 
00102       {
00103     RenderIMPPortraits( );
00104             
00105             // reset redraw flag
00106             fReDrawPortraitScreenFlag = FALSE;
00107       }
00108       return;
00109 }

00112 BOOLEAN RenderPortrait( INT16 sX, INT16 sY )
00113 {
00114   // render the portrait of the current picture
00115   VOBJECT_DESC    VObjectDesc;
00116       HVOBJECT hHandle;
00117       UINT32 uiGraphicHandle;
00118 
00119   if( fCharacterIsMale  )
00120       {
00121 
00122             // load it
00123     VObjectDesc.fCreateFlags=VOBJECT_CREATE_FROMFILE;
00124         FilenameForBPP( pPlayerSelectedBigFaceFileNames[ iCurrentPortrait ] , VObjectDesc.ImageFile);
00125         CHECKF(AddVideoObject(&VObjectDesc, &uiGraphicHandle));
00126        
00127         // show it
00128     GetVideoObject(&hHandle, uiGraphicHandle);
00129     BltVideoObject(FRAME_BUFFER, hHandle, 0, LAPTOP_SCREEN_UL_X + sX, LAPTOP_SCREEN_WEB_UL_Y + sY , VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY,NULL);
00130 
00131 
00132     // and kick it's sorry ..umm never mind, outta here
00133     DeleteVideoObjectFromIndex( uiGraphicHandle );
00134 
00135         
00136       }
00137       else
00138       {
00139       // load it
00140     VObjectDesc.fCreateFlags=VOBJECT_CREATE_FROMFILE;
00141         FilenameForBPP( pPlayerSelectedBigFaceFileNames[ iCurrentPortrait + 8 ] , VObjectDesc.ImageFile);
00142         CHECKF(AddVideoObject(&VObjectDesc, &uiGraphicHandle));
00143        
00144         // show it
00145     GetVideoObject(&hHandle, uiGraphicHandle);
00146     BltVideoObject(FRAME_BUFFER, hHandle, 0, LAPTOP_SCREEN_UL_X + sX, LAPTOP_SCREEN_WEB_UL_Y + sY , VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY,NULL);
00147 
00148 
00149     // and kick it's sorry ..umm never mind, outta here
00150     DeleteVideoObjectFromIndex( uiGraphicHandle );
00151 
00152       }
00153 
00154       return ( TRUE );
00155 }

00159 void IncrementPictureIndex( void )
00160 {
00161       // cycle to next picture
00162       
00163       iCurrentPortrait++;
00164 
00165       // gone too far?
00166       if( iCurrentPortrait > iLastPicture )
00167       {
00168             iCurrentPortrait = 0;
00169       }
00170 
00171 
00172   return; 
00173 }
00174 
00175 
00176 void DecrementPicture( void )
00177 {
00178   // cycle to previous picture
00179       
00180       iCurrentPortrait--;
00181 
00182       // gone too far?
00183   if( iCurrentPortrait < 0 )
00184       {
00185     iCurrentPortrait = iLastPicture;
00186       }
00187 
00188       return;
00189 }

00201   */

00203                                                                                      FONT_WHITE, DEFAULT_SHADOW, 
00204                                                                                      FONT_WHITE, DEFAULT_SHADOW, 
00205                                                                                      TEXT_CJUSTIFIED, 
00206                                                                                      LAPTOP_SCREEN_UL_X +  ( 343 ), LAPTOP_SCREEN_WEB_UL_Y + ( 205 ),BUTTON_TOGGLE, MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGH,
00207                                                                                           BtnGenericMouseMoveButtonCallback, (GUI_CALLBACK)BtnIMPPortraitNextCallback);

00213                                                             BUTTON_TOGGLE, MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGHEST - 1,
00214                                                             BtnGenericMouseMoveButtonCallback, (GUI_CALLBACK)BtnIMPPortraitPreviousCallback );
00215   */

00217                                                                                      FONT_WHITE, DEFAULT_SHADOW,

00246 void DestroyIMPPortraitButtons( void )
00247 {
00248 
00249       // will destroy buttons created for IMP Portrait screen
00250   
00251       // the next button
00252   RemoveButton(giIMPPortraitButton[ 0 ] );
00253   UnloadButtonImage(giIMPPortraitButtonImage[ 0 ] );
00254       
00255       // the previous button
00256   RemoveButton(giIMPPortraitButton[ 1 ] );
00257   UnloadButtonImage(giIMPPortraitButtonImage[ 1 ] );
00258       
00259       // the done button
00260   RemoveButton(giIMPPortraitButton[ 2 ] );
00261   UnloadButtonImage(giIMPPortraitButtonImage[ 2 ] );
00262 
00263       return;
00264 }

00267 void BtnIMPPortraitNextCallback(GUI_BUTTON *btn,INT32 reason)
00268 {
00269 
00270       // btn callback for IMP attrbite begin button
00271       if (!(btn->uiFlags & BUTTON_ENABLED))
00272             return;
00273 
00274       if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_DWN )
00275       {
00276              btn->uiFlags|=(BUTTON_CLICKED_ON);
00277       }
00278       else if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_UP )
00279       {
00280             if (btn->uiFlags & BUTTON_CLICKED_ON)
00281             {
00282       btn->uiFlags&=~(BUTTON_CLICKED_ON);
00283       
00284                   // next picture!!
00285                   IncrementPictureIndex( );
00286 
00287                   fReDrawPortraitScreenFlag = TRUE;
00288             }
00289       }     
00290 } 
00291 
00292 void BtnIMPPortraitPreviousCallback(GUI_BUTTON *btn,INT32 reason)
00293 {
00294 
00295       // btn callback for IMP attrbite begin button
00296       if (!(btn->uiFlags & BUTTON_ENABLED))
00297             return;
00298 
00299       if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_DWN )
00300       {
00301              btn->uiFlags|=(BUTTON_CLICKED_ON);
00302       }
00303       else if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_UP )
00304       {
00305             if (btn->uiFlags & BUTTON_CLICKED_ON)
00306             {
00307       btn->uiFlags&=~(BUTTON_CLICKED_ON);
00308       
00309                   // previous picture, please!!!
00310                   DecrementPicture( );
00311 
00312                   fReDrawPortraitScreenFlag = TRUE;
00313             }
00314       }     
00315 } 
00316 
00317 void BtnIMPPortraitDoneCallback(GUI_BUTTON *btn,INT32 reason)
00318 {
00319 
00320       // btn callback for IMP attrbite begin button
00321       if (!(btn->uiFlags & BUTTON_ENABLED))
00322             return;
00323 
00324       if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_DWN )
00325       {
00326              btn->uiFlags|=(BUTTON_CLICKED_ON);
00327       }
00328       else if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_UP )
00329       {
00330             if (btn->uiFlags & BUTTON_CLICKED_ON)
00331             {
00332       btn->uiFlags&=~(BUTTON_CLICKED_ON);
00333       
00334                   // go to main page
00335                   iCurrentImpPage = IMP_MAIN_PAGE;
00336 /*
00337                   // current mode now is voice
00338               if( iCurrentProfileMode < IMP__VOICE )
00339                   {
00340         iCurrentProfileMode = IMP__VOICE;
00341                   }
00342 */                
00343                   // if we are already done, leave
00344           if( iCurrentProfileMode == IMP__FINISH )
00345                   {
00346             iCurrentImpPage = IMP_FINISH;
00347                   } 
00348                   else
00349                   {
00350                         if( CameBackToPortraitsPageButNotFinished() )
00351                         {
00352 //                            iCurrentProfileMode = IMP__VOICE;
00353                   iCurrentImpPage = IMP_MAIN_PAGE;
00354                         }
00355                         else
00356                         {
00357                               iCurrentProfileMode = IMP__VOICE;
00358                         } 
00359                   }
00360 
00361                   // grab picture number
00362                   if( fCharacterIsMale  )
00363                   {
00364         // male
00365                         iPortraitNumber = iCurrentPortrait;
00366                   }
00367                   else
00368                   {
00369         // female
00370                         iPortraitNumber = iCurrentPortrait + ( 8 );
00371 
00372                   }
00373                   
00374                   fButtonPendingFlag = TRUE;
00375             }
00376       }     
00377 } 
00378 
00379 
00380 BOOLEAN CameBackToPortraitsPageButNotFinished()
00381 {
00382       //if we are in a page that comes after this one
00383       if( iCurrentProfileMode == IMP__PERSONALITY ||
00384                   iCurrentProfileMode == IMP__ATTRIBUTES ||
00385                   iCurrentProfileMode == IMP__VOICE )
00386       {
00387             return( TRUE );
00388       }
00389       else
00390       {
00391             return( FALSE );
00392       }
00393 }
